mapper.select: select t1.issue_type_id, t1.project_id, t1.status_id, t2.name as issue_type_name, t3.name as status_name, t3.code as status_code from fd_link_issue_status_linkage t1 left join fd_issue_type t2 on t1.issue_type_id = t2.id left join fd_status t3 on t1.status_id = t3.id where t1.project_id = #{projectId}

select * from fd_link_issue_status_linkage where project_id = #{projectId} and ( (issue_type_id = #{issueTypeId} and status_id = #{statusId} ) or (link_issue_type_id = #{issueTypeId} and link_issue_status_id = #{statusId} ) )
